Talk to a bird to find out the best route to take for the best bird-watching opportunities.
Ask a fish for advice on the best place to look for a lost ring at the beach or in the ocean.
Inquire a cat if it could help you find your lost favorite toy by giving you a clue or hint.
Ask a rabbit if it could teach you the best techniques to practice before a big rabbit-racing event.
Talk to an elephant if you ever wanted to learn some deep and wise lessons from an elderly animal with a lot of life experience.
